name: Generation Zero: Apparel Crafting
summary: It’s time to turn your ultimate 80s outfits into battle worthy garments with the addition of the Apparel Crafting in this latest update. By exploring and scavenging in Östertörn and Himfjäll, you will be able to find crafting materials or objects you can strip down for parts. Use these resources to enhance your clothing, making them as strong as they are fashionable.
